reviews.review_msg: Math-150 was the first ever course I've taken at SFU and Brenda made a pretty good impression right from the get go. The course material is hard and somewhat confusing at times, she's always willing to help out students during  workshop hours and even after lectures. After asking her a question, you'll be thinking "why didn't I think of that."

Overall, an amazing professor, his video lectures are absolutely amazing and really easy to understand. His midterms and finals can be challenging, if you haven't taken calculus before, but he provides you will lots of practice midterms/finals. His web assign/seminar assignments are also free marks.
Awesome professor. Puts a lot of effort into teaching. Lectures are very well organized. Uses interactive examples. Math can be boring sometimes, but not when he's teaching it. Best prof so far.

At first was difficult to understand through in accent but got used to after a week or two. He dumbs down his lectures a lot going through every single step he does and repeating points multiple times. Personally I liked this, made what he was teaching very clear and easy to follow.
